values: IM CHANGING MY LIVEJOURNAL!!!!!!!!!!!! WHITECYANIDE is MY NEW JOURNAL Add me to your friends.

Sometimes a stir of memories is more than just that, it is a thing more tangible and enrapturing than this feeble semblance of existance we call reality. 

I am swept up into this undertow.

In the end, maybee I'll be wrong, perhaps finding that a stir of memories is just that.

A stirring.

I refuse to adopt a fetus. For many reasons the main one being the trend quota. It's common, Im allergic.

s.h.i.t. I never got my best friend a birthday present, Oh. My. God. Fuck.

Spring break has been a lot of chaos and a lot of fun. Equal partions and vola, vacation! 

Sometimes I stare at the sky while the stars move behind my eyes and wonder....

I saw Dawn which was great, chaos there too. She got her car back and I guess the hotel party is not going to happen :(. 

I broke plans with Appie to go to Magic Stick because I forgot, and also I had no money. *cough carl cough*

Kat and I had fun, kristin and the Cooch Juice. Loong story. Never take medicine past the expiration date, especially if you dont know whats its suposed to do or if its for a girl and your a guy. Especially if its a perscroiption. 

Watched Trainspotting last night, and I have to watch it again because we wern't really paying attention. 

Drove around, choas choas, this summer scares me, and Im human. I accept truth and dont lie about limitations or subjections.  

The biggest thing you can learn in life is

It's O.K.

You are a GRAMMAR GOD!

If your mission in life is not already to
preserve the English tongue, it should be.
Congratulations and thank you!

How grammatically sound are you?

Well, not a lot is going on. Had a lot of fun though at Crazies. 

I went to Trixies and watched the movie 13. 13 is a fucking awesome movie. You all need to watch it.

I guess that BBQ yesterday was a bust, what happened? Ah well, we had fun regardless. Hell yes.

I still do not know what I want to do the rest of vacation. Lesliean. We still need to chill. Alright alright.

Let me tell you a story.

The last Trip I went on I was in Egypt with the Pyramids and the Gods and I saw the rise and fall of Egypt as if in a timeglass. It was amazing.

Thats what waterbeds to to people lol.

Im off for now. New layout in the works, something happy and digi-techno-dream-rainbow-mix. Not sure what yet.

Well, new layout, I think it's awesome. What do you think?

What is one thing you want to do this summer?

Leslie, spring break, you and me. Count on it.

Spring break Friday! Yes! I can not wait! I am going to have so much fun.

John McQuiston is back in school which is awesome and I have a class with him.

My ex-boyfriend should be out of the hospital for suicide in a few days, I really hope he gets better, I care about him and it must be hard on him, but I've gone through this before so It's really hard on me.

My brother got second place in Mr AB. Go Andrew. (He deserved first, he was original).

Well, theres not much else to say.

Im having fun working on my original for next year. It's about being fake in all of it's form's very cynacal. Ill post it when it's done.

I'm just another house hold product. Im not the savior, I'm something much more vile. No Jesus here, just my own personal Anti-Christ with which I scour my soul. 

I blow bubbles at funerals and dead bodies make me smile. Im the one who stops at a fire and strains to see someone die. The covered strecher my favorite alter. This lovers quartet of tears is the only rain I've ever felt, and it feeds me, like a delicious poisin. 

Just another kind of sick. The morticians matermind. A puppet upon phramaldahide strings. Let's stick to the chloroform. My favorite intoxication. 

Don't forget to play 

I like to see smoke rise upon a delosate rain soaked place, heat despite this never-feeling-emotion of ice. 

Its a spark in the dark and a glowing ember.... 
A place to start 

I have this need to draw upon my corpse. All I see is endless faces and eyes in my personal asylum. 

THIS IS SIN 

I step softly into my own Secret Garden where death awaits with tea. The burning crickets scream their symphonies to me, my lullaby. Step upon the stone-grey-skulls and dance upon these broken bones, push aside the painting, and step through this malformed collage, pull back the drapes and step-one-two. 

None of this is real 

Upon my swing I sit, as snap dragons curl upon my frail edges and bloody-fireflies dance upon a ruby sky. Vines curl around me and sink their hungry teeth, seek them upon rotting flesh. White rabbit's with eyes of red, suckle upon my wrists, stained, another fashion show, another trend. 

None of it even matters in the end 

A rain falls upon my garden, white trenchcoat stained to red. 

Lost within this painting 

Death grows like an infecting-affection, a deligtfull-defection, an adiction with a earthy aftertase of deadly aphrodesiac. 

Love is greed 

This rainfall-dead with four walls spraypaited 


"TAINTED" 
"DRINK ME" 
"EAT ME" 
"TOXIC" 


Crimson-colored-clouds fall upon the earth in this rolling fog of red. 


Where flowers bloom white 



Ill Never Tell
I hide withing this closet with the sunlight facing dusk.
As skeletons walk I hide within this closet with the sunlight facing dusk.

Current Mood: Space, tortured alone. Current Music: Tsunami Bomb - Take The Reigns Current Persona: Kyle, rainbow colored bandage. You realize dear, that it's quite clear, that nothing will be the same. This world you realize, is just a dream, and once you wake, death will be your final scream. Bloody chains and ragged dolls, with drunken confessions all to save your immor-t-al soul. This drop-dead-drama-queen he's finally out of breath, the sky, it's raining red. Rusted pipes. Take the snow, press it to your gums, pretty soon you'll be flying again. You can forget your just a has-been-jock, popular till one day, fag's the newest craze, and by chance they notice the way you walk, a lisp from babies beating, and your LABELED Primed, and ready for sale to the highest bidder with the creulest crack. You used to dream of suicide, screaming inside, because no one would hear. "This is a Christian household, we don't like to hear that word" Silenced by crusifixtion, now they tell you to scream, scarred bloody vocal chords is all you have left from a life of a suicidal requiem for a dream. Empty bottles and dry needles offer a nice reprieve, so you use, and they use you, drug-addict-gang-bang with no one but yourself to blame. When I was five I learned of God's promise, a rainbow, sacrifice. When I was six, I found my own scarlet letter, it consists of all six colors. Branded By all the pretty boys for the perfect blue eyes. Soft blonde hair fades to black, as first we bleach, then dye, bruises so blue they match the black, like a sadist's smiling back. Shaking like a junkie in withdrawl, it's just from dad's voice screaming in the hall. Crossdressing-childs-play, touched in all the wrong ways, to busy for a child you never wanted, you turn a blind eye, and I... I stare at the quickly falling sky

Maybee I can take the bus to see him, but that would make me scared riding the bus into warren. Im so spoiled. I've never ridden a bus without my parents.

School is going alright I suppose. I have to bring up three grades but I know I can do it, I'm not to worried. I have some time and I know it will be fine.

I love you John. I miss you.

Current Mood: Insomniac of tender smiles and soft raindrops
Current Music: Incubus - The Warmth
Current Persona: Derek an a starry summers night

I have no idea what this says or means. I dont even think it can express my feeings. All I know is that I tried ot write how I feel and this came out, I blacked out and don't know what I wrote. I just hope it doesn't sound depressed and all wrong. True there is a tone of sadness to my feelings but it is most surely overshadowed by feelings of happiness and something else which is like a kind of blank bliss of nothng that is everything. It's the emotion of a smile.

I love John so much. He's so great and I can't wait to see him tomarrow.
I remember riding in the car, wishing to stay that way forever, just to dream in endless nights of slepless bliss, among the stars to stay, while yellow lights flash and kisses upon hads forever stay. Love never meant so much in a world of lust, the word has lost all meaning here, in a picture of a dream, we dare to belong among a steet in the warm dark. This is my dream, and soft voices pound behind through wires and speakers to the ride along the way, softly sining sinking down into you with vanilla softly lingering upon pressed lips.


I feel like Im walking in the middle of a summers night, lost within the stars.

Poetry is the only language I can use to express the way I feel, it is my laguage.

Lacuna Coi the stars never so bright within a room of pitch black spite, where stars begin to glow with visions starry and blurred, a voice upon the phone, with proof enough for you. Always leaning forever longing, finding dreaming, casting waking, always fading, sitting in a chair you speak to pills and whisper to voices as we all dance along in this dream. Casting shaking, shadows dancing in this beautiful form of smoke, smiling shying, olding back in the cold you walk, finding something more, something real, you end in bliss of never more. Slowly dying, desperately crying, slowly smiling upona dawn that as promised has come, to never and a second star you fly away, the worlds chains braking their hold on you, as you stray no more.

Youd better learn to fly, as your walking upo the sky, angels wings dance as they pass on by, no longer falling. Among a cloud of soft sweet smoke, as secrets spoke, you press upon soft lips, wishes of a yesterday, when nerves held and we looked away. A way for a dream, this is my wish.

Loving you. your in my dreams. Another heart another dream, silencing the screams, daring to dream, passing by, the pasts pain fades goodbye.

I'd like to close my eyes and go numb
but there's a cold wind coming from
the top of the highest high-rise today.
It's not a breeze cause' it blows hard.
Yes and it wants me to discard the humanity I know,
watch the warmth blow away.

So do you think I should adhere to that pressing new frontier?
And leave in my wake a trail of fear
Or should I hold my head up high
and throw a wrench in spokes by
leaving the air behind me clear

So don't let the world bring you down.
Not everyone here is that fucked up and cold.
Remember why you came and while you're alive
experience the warmth before you grow old.

Current Music: Incubus - The Warmth

Everyone, what is your favorite summer memory, or what is sonething you want to do this summer, even if you know you can't.

I just need to find myself a job. I really need a job. If I could just get that then I know everything will work out.

I feel a lot better. I need some more motivation and who knows what could happen. Im feeling good, maybee this is spring fever, although I haven't ever had spring fever before.

This is good, really good.

Current Mood: So desperately dying.
Current Music: Space
Current Persona: Crying to be anyone but me.

Lately I've felt like just giving up, I've felt this way for years, but especially in the last few days it all just seems so stupid and pointless. Like the world isnt going to stop trying to do what it wants with you untill it gets its way. 

 I just feel like whats the point any more, it feels like the world is trying to force what it wants on me. I just am sick of it all, I wish I could just slip into oblivion, I wish I could just be the same, im sick of fighting, Im to tired of it all. Fighting for a voice, fighting for a job, fighting for an education, fighting for love, it all seems so hopless.

I feel like a horrible person for saying all this, it's like im sick because I might have what should make me happy, but I'm not. Im just getting pissed off, and I'm sick and tired of it all. If life has worn me out this much in 16 years Im just affraid of who I'll be in 30more.

I feel so helpless. I stil haven't heard back from my fucking agent on my book.

I still dont have a job.

I still dont have a car, or a licence, or even a permit and I'm near 17.

I'm nearly failing all of my classes due to absences.

Do you know what it's like to wake up every day and wish to god that you we're everything and anything but who and what you are? Ever wish you had never been born, every day, every day, just waiting to fuck yourself up on something just to be able to go on for one more day. 

Somehow I keep going on, for how long, for how long.

Last winter I remember crying and screaming to my mother that I wish to God I had never been born and that I thought it was some form of sick joke by God. DO you know what thats like to tell your mother you wish you had died, that you had never been born, and see the way she looks at you?

I just can't find the awnsers, cant see the reasons why....

Current Mood: Soul Searching
Current Music: Natalie -- Smoke
Current Persona: Searching My Soul

So many questions yearn to be awnserd and I can't find any of the awnsers.

Faith.

I'm so mixed up right now. I went to this church and these two guys were really nice to me and they're great people and we're kind of friends now but would all this change if they knew I was gay? Sometimes I just wish that such a thing didn't exist. Everyone looks in the mirror and wishes they we're different. I wish I was the same. Im not looking for pitty, I'm looking for awnsers. Sometimes I just need to hear things out loud or read my thoughts in this place to help me figure things out.

How can love be wrong, and hate be right? Or is this just a fasad people place out. Somtimes it seems that it's simply a matter of we fear what we don't know. Other times it seems to be something deeper. Honesty is something this world could use a lot more of. Then we could work things out, and with a bit of compassion you never know.

Which reminds me of Bush's anti gay-marrige fight. What a fucking load of bullshit. You love who you love, gender should not keep people from getting married. If we let same sex marriges become legal, not that much is going to change. We already have same sex couples with children. I mean, the only thing that will change is the title, something that says you're married. It is not that big of a deal. We are infringing on human rights by banning same sex unions. It's wrong. Plain and simple. It's inhumane. Women can vote, blacks are no longer segregated, slavery is gone, but no same sex unions. It doesnt make any sense and I fear that if Bush gets his way it will doom us for years.

Im going to see A Perfect Circle with Alexis, Sean, and Josh. It should be really interesting. I don't know why I say that exactly, use that word, interesting. I guess it just fits for some reason.

Im haunted by a faith I no longer feel is real, yet whispers of when I was young and still believed visit me and tug at my soul. Haunted knowing that once, I dreamed I could have it all. Dreamed I could be just like you. I hate pity, I dont want sympathy. Sometimes I like to dream I'm someone different, as Im sure we all do, I just have the strength to say my inner feelings and thoughts and dreams instead of hiding behind a lie.

Withing A Perfect Circle I Dream

Soul Affect Card
Rare Unique Edition

Gate Syntax: 61369666
Datalog Origin:6/13/03
Gatehack Origin: Matrix
Virus Core: 69

KarmaWhite is a schitzophrenic dissasociative emogoth who writes poetry and fiction works. He takes comfort in the world of mild dissacoiative psychodelics. His favorite colors are black and white. He is a healer shaman who does tarot. He is deeply spiritual. Usually quiet he is quite the shy charecter untill you get to know him. He opens up to few who he trusts and takes his friends and loyalty to them serious. He is a strong foe and an even stronger ally.
Strengths: His strengths lie in his Magicks, loyalty, and empathy. He is always there when soemone needs him, and he is a strong fighter both for what he believes in and those close to him.
Weaknesses: His weaknesses are his bouts of manic depression which can be onset at random times for no aparent reason and his bouts of mindless rage.
Special Skills: His special skills include his musical inclinations and his magical powers which he never uses unless nessecary.
Weapons: His wepons are his words and his art of influence upon others. His psychological affinity lends him great power which he weilds in a gracefull and deadly manor.
Other Personalities: His other personalities include a drug-addict, a little girl, an mentally insane teenage boy, a musican, and a vampire, these being his most common.


Make your own LiveJournal Trading Card!
Brought to you by Modified By:
KarmaWhite
Soul Affect Card
Swords
A sacrifice mediates the situation and returns it to normal. This card represents the taking of a loss. He's the sacrificial lamb, whether it's accepted with grace or only because it's been forced upon him. In either case, his ordeal serves to clear the air of general tension, denial and game playing. The predicament brings issues to a head, making it possible to clear the slate and allow everyone to start over.
Divinatory Meanings: Symbolizes release and rebirth, the transformation that results from detachment. It is time to cut cords with the past. Bring in the harvest, clear away the remains of the last cycle. The Death card is calling you to shed old identities in order to be able to express new ones, much like a snake shedding its skin. Go through this process of transformation willingly and voluntarily.
Reversed: Whether it's purely symbolic or has to do with real events, such a situation can clear the collective conscience and helps to break old patterns. It's a good thing that it's you playing this vulnerable role, and not someone else who may be broken by the situation. You are resilient and regenerative, someone who can view this experience as educational and not be totally victimized by it. This is the enlightened attitude. Your sacrifice will make a difference in the larger flow of events, even if it's not fair and you don't deserve it.
Element: This suit represents the rational mind and its ability to discriminate. Swords cut through things in order to pierce illusion, to differentiate between fantasy and reality. This card has an affinity with Air and Water in both their destructive and healing properties, the black and white side of life.

I know that I am going to be a novelist of realistic fiction and fantassy as well as a poet. 

Interior design, massage therapy? I just cant decide what else to do. Something I can enjoy and live comfortably off of. As long as I get into EMU I know I can make it in life.

Current Mood: Awake
Current Music: Ana's Song
Current Persona: Jaecen. He's singing.

Tell me somethin. A secret, a confession, what you think of me, what you hope, wish, dream, fear. Anything at all. It can even be anonymous. Just tell me something I don't know. Surprise me. Let's see what happens.

Have you ever felt like no matterhow hard you try you just might not make it. Do your goals ever seem to get farther away with time, not closer. 

Look back to sixth grade and think if this is where you thought you would be?

Tears fade to smiles, time moves on and scars fade away. Time heals souls and helps ease the past and make room for the future. We might not know what it holds for us, but we can face it with a smile.

Another question for everyone. Define the words Beautiful and Love.

Lost in shades of gray,
In this world of shattered dreams and broken wings,
I have seen more than you care to know.
Lost in a world of frozen tears and hidden fears,
You're blind to see the pain you've caused.
Whispers of a dream withing a nightmare,
The pain of salvation.
One last wish and it all fades to gray.
Chained to yesterday I shall never stay.
I am who I am and I say what I feel,
Those who mind don't matter,
Those who matter don't mind.
My Karma's Bled White.

Marriage is love.

Tyler - If you ever had hopes of anything between you and me you killed it. You never could keep your mouth shut and I hate you for it. Sean - I know you read this. Even though you don't comment. Im sorry for yelling at you, I simply needed some time to figure out what was going on and to find out where people lay on certain issues. I guess that telling you anything was a big mistake, but I guess thats what happens some times. Just when I thought I could trust you again you go and do this. You can be sure of one thing, I will never be telling you anything any more, you already know to much, and you obviously have no problem telling everyone about everything, so my telling you anything is like telling everyone. It was your decisions that made it this way, not mine. Make sure you print this out and give it to Alexis, ok. I know you are happy now, I mean you have Don and all them and Josh and Tony, so now that Alexis is happy I know that you are as well. Have some fun, loosen up, you don't need to be the one looking out for everyone anymore. Lie back and do something fun. You deserve it.

Alexis - I think you need to take some time out, like a few weeks and hang out with Josh, really get to know him, and his friends. I think you should spend some time with him alone especially. I never really fit in anyways. I never have. Im gay, and yeah, this sounds like a sob story but stay with me it makes sense. I can hang out with girls and get along great but theres still a special bond between girls and girls and I never really hit it off with guys for obvious reasons, and a group of straight guy friends is better than one being gay. Think about it, it makes sense. So you all need to just go have some fun, and don't worry about things, just do what feels right to you. Hang out and party, go see a movie, do something fun. It'll be great, I just know it. Im to different, my beliefs and personality don't fit with you, and I see that now, we're to different, it never would have worked anyways. I was just lying to myself trying to convince myself of something that would never happen. I've been so blind and selfish all this time and it needs to stop. I need to open my eyes and stop calling all of you blind. I realize that my illusions are jsut that and I digress into truth.

Psycoligical Profile

You are what is known as a dabbler -you have no real focus in life so you go from subject to subject some that you barely understand but feel like its important to know. You surround yourself with an air of darkness and probably to others seem the depressed or dark individual but in reality you are much like the rest of them with a bit more insight. You try very hard to not be commonplace but few of the things you adopt are really a part of you. You are not someone with a lot of focus -you are a dreamer and idealist even though you may seem a pessimist -you question things that you don't really care about but feel you should, you want people to be impressed with you but deep down you really just want someone who sticks by you and gets to know who you really are. You enjoy fantasy aspects of life and history because they appeal to your imagination and you often wish you could be the hero type in some story though you might claim you wish to be the honorable mage. You dislike the fact that you are young and do all you can to divert people from realizing it -you feel trapped and confined by the stereotypes given your age and you do your best to not get stuck in them. you are finding the process of the transition from youth to adult an annoying one and you keep looking for people to help inspire you rather than just associate with your peers.

Perhaps this is me. I see half of myself here, my core being somewhat different. Still denial and self image all play a part in things. I hope if the following is not my core and who I am inside, then I may evolve into this. I have faith that in time, who I am will become clear and settle as the excitement and bustle of youth ebbs into a more calm and clear perception of things.

You are one of the old souls, finding yourself often feeling misplaced in this world. You often question why you were born at this time rather than some part of history that appeals to your senses more. You are someone that thinks big because to think small is too confining for you and you like to dream of possibility if you must live in practicality. You are an extremely sensitive person, given to great acts of love and many struggles with emotional expression -you fear that your own hurts will indirectly hurt others and you have a hard time dealing with inflicting that kind of pain even at the cost of your own emotional well-being. You have an extreme sense of black comedy -that is the humerous in the bizarre and macabre. You delight in pointing out people's idiosynchrasies and you make sure to surround yourself with people that challenge your humor and intelligence. You are prone to bouts of self doubt and defeat but you always manage to come back to things. You are tired of going but you know that the only other option is to give up and you don't want to let anyone down. You are fiercely protective and proud of your friends and while you give your love sparingly to those that have truly earned it, when they have, they have earned your complete loyalty. You have a child's appreciation for many things perhaps because you understand that innocence makes things more appealing and oftentimes you wish you could go back to the point when responsibilities were few and magick with a "k" was still all around you.
